text: Ejnar Hertzsprung (8 October 1873 – 21 October 1967) was a Danish chemist and astronomer born in Copenhagen. In the period 1911–1913, together with Henry Norris Russell, he helped to create the Hertzsprung–Russell diagram. == Asteroids discovered == * 1627 Ivar (25 September 1929) * 1702 Kalahari (7 July 1924) == Honors == ===Awards=== * Gold Medal of the Royal Astronomical Society in 1929 * Bruce Medal in 1937 ===Named after him=== * lunar impact crater Hertzsprung * main-belt asteroid 1693 Hertzsprung == References == == Other websites == * Bruce Medal page * Awarding of Bruce Medal: PASP 49 (1937) 65 * Awarding of RAS gold medal: MNRAS 89 (1929) 404 Category:1873 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Danish astronomers Category:Scientists from Copenhagen Category:Danish chemists
title: Ejnar Hertzsprung
